entities.name: the eye of the snake
entities.description: The location where snow is untouched and can be melted easily. (Excerpt: 'she could melt them an easier path through the untouched snow between them and the greenhouses.')

entities.name: snow
entities.description: A weather condition that has arrived in December. (Excerpt: 'December arrived, bringing with it more snow...')

entities.name: greenhouses
entities.description: A location where plants are kept warm and safe from the cold. (Excerpt: 'between them and the greenhouses.')

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of the prefects who is helping with the decoration of the castle. (Excerpt: 'Ron and Hermione’s prefect duties...')

entities.name: Hermione
entities.description: One of the prefects who is helping with the decoration of the castle. (Excerpt: 'Ron and Hermione’s prefect duties...')

entities.name: Peeves
entities.description: A person who is causing trouble by trying to strangle Ron with tinsel. (Excerpt: 'You try putting up tinsel when Peeves has got the other end...')

entities.name: tinsel
entities.description: An object used for decoration that is being put up by Ron and Hermione. (Excerpt: 'You try putting up tinsel when Peeves has got the other end...')

entities.name: first years
entities.description: A group of people who are spending their break times inside because of the cold. (Excerpt: 'watch over first and second years spending their break times inside...')

entities.name: second years
entities.description: A group of people who are spending their break times inside because of the cold. (Excerpt: 'watch over first and second years spending their break times inside...')

entities.name: Argus Filch
entities.description: A person who is suspicious that the holiday spirit might show itself in an outbreak of wizard duels. (Excerpt: 'patrol the corridors in shifts with Argus Filch...')

entities.name: holiday spirit
entities.description: A concept that might show itself in an outbreak of wizard duels. (Excerpt: 'the holiday spirit might show itself in an outbreak of wizard duels...')

entities.name: wizard duels
entities.description: An event that Argus Filch is suspicious might happen during the holidays. (Excerpt: 'the holiday spirit might show itself in an outbreak of wizard duels...')

relationships.description: Ron and Hermione are working together as prefects. (Excerpt: 'Ron and Hermione’s prefect duties...')
